name: The Pickles In A Pickle
description:
The game was made in 24 hours at Create Together GameJam, 9-10 March 2018.

https://www.facebook.com/CreateTogetherCzestochowa/

1st Award.

Authors :

  • Monika Kowalczuk
  • Artur (Bagrit) Kramer
  • Tymek Witczak
  • Aleksander Gielnicki
  • Michał Gruszka

The pickles need your help with getting out of a jar.

wasd - camera steering/ optional RightMouse+ rotate

LeftMouse click on the pickle to move it. Be aware of the traps on your way through the jar.
